title: How to Draw a Cat Using the Word Cat

steps.title: Get a blank piece of paper.
steps.content: Get a blank piece of paper. Write the letters C - A - T with a 1 cm (0.39 in) gap between each letter using a pencil. Create a hook-like shape, on the letter T, at the end, as shown in the image above.

steps.title: Draw another letter "C" over the existing "C."
steps.content: Draw another letter "C" over the existing "C." Connect the ends to make the shape of a tail. Then, connect the "C" to the letter "A" as shown.

steps.title: Turn the letter "A" into a circle.
steps.content: Turn the letter "A" into a circle. Use the hook at the end of the letter "A" to create the shape of back leg.

steps.title: Draw a mushroom shape at the top for the head on the letter "T".
steps.content: Draw a mushroom shape at the top for the head on the letter "T". Then, draw a rounded shape on the vertical line of the letter "T" to make the shape of the mouth and nose. Draw the front paws using the bottom of the letter "T" as a reference.

steps.title: Add any extra details, such as fur or patterns to your liking.
steps.content: Add any extra details, such as fur or patterns to your liking.
